direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods query transfer history but for different asset types (spot vs. futures).
Both methods access and retrieve historical data related to asset transfers.
Both methods involve querying account-related data, which can affect the state of the account.

enhanced_by.reason: Initialization of the request handler is required before any API request, including spot transfer history.
Environment setup is necessary to ensure the correct state before querying spot transfer history.
Both methods involve verifying historical data, which can involve similar exception handling.
